2.6.25  3:43 am   When do you try your best?

Â Â Â Â Â  i can't tell until afterwards

2.6.25  2:26 am   To your recollection, have you ever used "the lick" in any of your music? Either accidentally or on purpose

Â Â Â Â Â  of course. it's an inside joke among certain types of players, and i don't want those folks to go home empty handed

2.6.25  1:52 am   any big takeaways from your production process rn

Â Â Â Â Â  i need to chill out

Â Â Â Â Â  not that i know of

Â Â Â Â Â  was it this one

Â Â Â Â Â  no, that doesn't seem accurate

2.5.25  11:06 pm   when do you think humanity peaked 

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe a bit later

2.5.25  10:23 pm   I want to record in my apartment but I'm afraid I'll bother my neighbors, any tips?

Â Â Â Â Â  no. this is impossible. you won't be able to do it

Â Â Â Â Â  for style

Â Â Â Â Â  how about a box

2.5.25  10:00 pm   What is the best way to deal with idiots on the Internet?

Â Â Â Â Â  who's idea was it for you to have to deal with them

Â Â Â Â Â i don't know how to keep track of the types. ever since i learned that it's literally music's job to lie about this

Â Â Â Â Â mambo number 5

Â Â Â Â Â  how about a box

Â Â Â Â Â  useful, super chill,

2.5.25  5:36 pm   Why isnt the element of surprise on the periodic table?

Â Â Â Â Â  it's helium. don't worry about it

Â Â Â Â Â  sure

2.5.25  2:31 pm   why does the world assume we'd do anything for a klondike bar

Â Â Â Â Â  that's not the world, that's just klondike commercials from ..... a long time ago

2.5.25  12:52 pm   What time did the Internet start?

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't recall

2.5.25  11:16 am   I have a joke about you, but it is kind of a little bit mean (I'm sorry, I dont mean any offense, love you)...

Q: How many bill wurtzes does it take to screw in a light bulb?

A: Just one, but it'll take him a thousand years to do it because he'll first need to analyze the light bulb changing process to determine the best and most efficient light bulb changing techniques, and that will lead him to question the very nature of what even is a light bulb and what does it really mean to change it. Maybe there's a more creative and exciting way to define what a light bulb could be and what changing it could entail, and maybe there's exciting ways to defy expectations of what changing a light bulb could look like, including changing something that is not a light bulb or doing something with a light bulb that is not changing it. 

Â Â Â Â Â  that's not a joke, it's just the cold hard truth. which is in fact hilarious

2.5.25  10:48 am   i'm so tired of dress shopping. what kind of dress should i buy? your opinion is the only one i care about at the moment

Â Â Â Â Â  how about that blue or gold one

2.5.25  10:16 am   everyone around me is living a life of never questioning why 4+4+3 doesn't equal 10. they're all so healthy

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe but in another way it's also healthy to check it out for yourself. you'll have a stronger relationship with those numbers (10, 11, etc) if you do

Â Â Â Â Â  me

Â Â Â Â Â  guitar

Â Â Â Â Â  i believe so

2.5.25  7:38 am   What's your favorite non-Latin script?

Â Â Â Â Â  greek

2.5.25  7:33 am   I want to know more about unknownsongfromthe1970s.mp3. It sounds so good!

Â Â Â Â Â  that would be 'sultans of swing' by dire straits, as i've just been informed or perhaps already knew at some point. but when i hear it next time in a store i'll probably forget the titular information once again. that's sort of the fun of this little riff

2.5.25  7:07 am   Do you try to improve most of the time

Â Â Â Â Â  yes

2.5.25  6:34 am   Do you think MiniDisc players are cool? ðŸ’½ 

Â Â Â Â Â  sure, if they actually work and actually play a disc that you would otherwise have no way of accessing

2.5.25  6:29 am   back in 2022 i asked if you liked tonic water. you said no. still don't?

Â Â Â Â Â  to be specific, i don't like to drink it, nor interact with it in any other way

2.5.25  5:02 am   I have a memory of showing my friend 'La de da de da de da de day oh' for the first time back when it came out, and when she heard the lyric "its the end of the world and i just cant wait" she jokingly said "ha relatable" just in time for the following line ("i know that you can relate"). My question is did you know people were going to respond like this, and write the follow up line in advance, or was this just a neat coincidence?

Â Â Â Â Â  in songwriting you always strive to nail that intuition

2.5.25  4:20 am   whatre your thoughts on sydney australia 

Â Â Â Â Â  unheard of. no just kidding that's not true, it's world famous

2.5.25  3:16 am   thoughts on agriculture?

Â Â Â Â Â  so crazy it just might work

2.5.25  1:52 am   how do you deal with attacks of melancholy

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't get those

2.5.25  1:18 am   where is Lithuania?

Â Â Â Â Â  near estonia and latvia

2.5.25  12:27 am   my current understanding of people is that over time they change, but not into fundamentally different people, just into bigger ones. one's younger self never really disappears, instead it sort of gets surrounded by all the other stuff you learn and become. all the stuff you used to think and be can get new context to it. I was wondering if you think that's true, and if you have any interesting takes about the general nature of people, and felt like sharing

Â Â Â Â Â  yes that sounds about right

2.5.25  12:02 am   Do you think that in the future eggs will just lay themselves? 

Â Â Â Â Â  i wouldn't rule that out

2.4.25  11:44 pm   how do i know if something i make should be released publically or not? is it all just vibes?

Â Â Â Â Â  you can just decide which way you want it to be

2.4.25  11:32 pm   what is it with the saxophone and bebop musicians

Â Â Â Â Â  that's just the sound it makes. the saxophone goes 'bebop'

Â Â Â Â Â  yes, about 47% of the time

Â Â Â Â Â  both

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe some clinks

2.4.25  8:16 pm   how to go about getting better at things that can't be improved upon?

Â Â Â Â Â  well first of all whoever said it can't be improved was wrong

2.4.25  8:13 pm   When will the thing happen? 

Â Â Â Â Â  any time

2.4.25  8:01 pm   whats the average price of everything ever bought

Â Â Â Â Â  72 dollars

2.4.25  7:56 pm   do you find writing lyrics to be a fun endeavor in matching a story to the emotion of the music, or a necessary evil that simply results from wanting to use one's voice as an instrument? (or some other third thing)

Â Â Â Â Â  none of those. when it's going right, it's not a separate activity. songwriting includes anything that happens with music and language together, and the more intimate the relationship is between the music and the language, the better

2.4.25  7:03 pm   why did mary have a little lamb?

Â Â Â Â Â  to seem more approachable

2.4.25  6:49 pm   Why is it that big elephants can always understand small elephants?

Â Â Â Â Â  this is due to lorentz transformations

2.4.25  6:49 pm   do you collect any physical media? like cd, vinyl, games, etc.?

Â Â Â Â Â  sort of

2.4.25  5:31 pm   In your song, when I get older it reads "fame" but you say fate softly. Im sure of it. Why? is there a deeper meaning?

Â Â Â Â Â  maybe you're hearing some percussion that sounds like the other word. there was no intention of having the word 'fate' there. you hearing it should be considered a failure on my part

2.4.25  3:21 pm   Can you describe the number 8 for me?

Â Â Â Â Â  2x2x2. a cube. number of corners on a cube. 4+4. number of edges on a stop sign
